message_private: このレベルは作者によって非公開にされています。このレベルは自分以外は閲覧できません。
message_unlisted: レベルを”リンクを知っている人のみ”にしました。
message_censored: このレベルは {reason} のために検閲されました。

manage.replace_upload_title: Click or drag a Cytoid level to this area
manage.replace_upload_subtitle: Your level must have the same ID as the current one.

metadata.title: メタデータ
metadata.title_hint: The music title in its original form and language.
metadata.localized_title_hint: The music title in English. Literal translation is preferred. Optional.
metadata.artist_hint: The music artist name(s) in their original form and language. Use a comma followed by a space to separate multiple names.
metadata.localized_artist_hint: The music artist name(s) in English. Literal translation is preferred.
metadata.music_url_hint: The music URL as posted by the artist(s). If there is no public URL, link to the official website of the work (i.e. game, anime) in which the music makes its first appearance.
metadata.cover_art_hint: The cover artist name(s) in their original form and language. Use a comma followed by a space to separate multiple names.
metadata.cover_art_localized_hint: The cover artist name(s) in English. Literal translation is preferred.
metadata.cover_art_url_hint: The cover art URL as posted by the artist(s). If there is no public URL, link to the official website of the work (i.e. game, anime) in which the cover is used.

admin.censorship_reason_hint: One word to summarize why this level is not suitable for public viewing
